statements: SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT donation_id, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_id < 1000;
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND amount < 500 ORDER BY donation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT donation_id, amount, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_id = 5
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT donation_date, donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending'
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT donation_id, donation_date, donor_name FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT payment_method_name, payment_provider FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_provider = 'PayPal';
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM payment_methods JOIN payment_transactions ON payment_methods.payment_method_id = payment_transactions.payment_method_id;

SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, payment_provider FROM donations JOIN payment_transactions ON donations.donation_id = payment_transactions.donation_id JOIN payment_methods ON payment_transactions.payment_method_id = payment_methods.payment_method_id WHERE donation_amount >= 500 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' AND donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors INNER JOIN transactions ON donors.donor_id = transactions.donation_id ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT payment_method, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' GROUP BY card_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, payment_method FROM donations INNER JOIN transactions ON donations.donation_id = transactions.donation_id INNER JOIN payment_methods ON transactions.payment_id = payment_methods.payment_id WHERE donation_amount >= 500 AND payment_method IN ('Cash', 'Credit Card') ORDER BY donor_name, donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT donor_name, campaign_name, transaction_date FROM donors JOIN transactions ON donors.donor_id = transactions.donor_id JOIN campaigns ON transactions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
